summary: Server nx4.jasmin.ac.uk down to test new configuration.

updates.details: Server nx4 is currently down to test a new configuration. Other NX servers nx1 - nx3 available as normal.
Server nx4 still out of service. nx1.jasmin being investigated for connection problems. nx2 and nx3 should be available as normal.
The NLDS is currently unavailable due to operational problems.

summary: Currently unavailable due to a server disk failure

updates.details: Service may imminently need to stop ingests (writing) to minimise further risk to service. Further updates to follow.
Service will be unavailable from 15:00 today Fri 3 Oct until further notice, apologies for any inconvenience.
NOTE: Second reschedule to 18:00 Wednesday 29th October. No disruption is expected but all services remain at risk for approximately 3 hours between 18:00 and 21:00.
NOTE: Rescheduled to 18:00 Thursday 30th October. No disruption is expected but all services remain at risk for approximately 3 hours between 18:00 and 21:00.

The RAL Site's primary internet connection will be down for between 15 minutes and 2 hours at 07:00 on Tuesday 28th October. The connection should roll over to the secondary link and no disruption is expected.
RAL Site's secondary internet connection to undergo maintenance between 09:00-18:00 Saturday 18th & 09:00-18:00 BST Sunday 19th October. No disruption expected but all services remain at risk.

summary: Scheduled update to the CEDA Data Catalogue, disruption should be minimal

updates.details: The CEDA Data Catalogue service will be at updated around 1030 on Tuesday 14th October to provide a options to get either a BibTeX or CIS formatted citation file for dataset and collections alongside some minor additions to the catalogue API functionality.
